    <p class="text">

And: students have no background in ethics! In short, <mark style="background-color: #a6001a; color: white">how do you teach ethics to non-ethicists</mark> within a session or two -- and, perhaps, without having much a background in ethics teaching yourself? </p>
    <p class="text">

In short, you need to <mark style="background-color: #222081; color: white">teach data science to non-data scientists.</mark>
